Class ReadBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • htsjdk.samtools.cram.encoding.readfeatures.ReadBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadFeature, java.io.Serializable

    public class ReadBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ReadFeature
    A read feature representing a single base with associated quality score.
